# AkademiTrack - STU Tidsregistrering **Version:** v1.0.0 Automatisk oppm칮teregistrering for STU-칮kter p친 Akademiet / Automated attendance registration for STU sessions at Akademiet
## 丘멆잺 Important Notice **This is version 1.0.0 - Testing phase not yet complete.** Please expect potential bugs and report any issues you encounter. --- ## 游游 Norsk ### Om Programmet AkademiTrack er et automatiseringsverkt칮y som hjelper studenter ved Akademiet med 친 registrere oppm칮te for STU (Selvstendige Terminoppgaver) 칮kter automatisk. Programmet overv친ker timeplandata og registrerer oppm칮te n친r registreringsvinduene 친pner seg. ### Hovedfunksjoner - **Lagrede innloggingsopplysninger**: Kryptert lagring av Feide brukernavn, passord og skolenavn for automatisk innlogging - **Auto-start automatisering**: Valgfri automatisk oppstart av automatisering n친r programmet 친pnes - **Intelligent overv친king**: Overv친ker kun aktuelle STU-칮kter for gjeldende dag - **Klassekonflikt deteksjon**: Hopper automatisk over STU-칮kter som overlapper med andre timer - **Optimalisert ytelse**: Gj칮r kun 칠n API-foresp칮rsel per dag for 친 hente timeplandata - **Sanntids registrering**: Registrerer oppm칮te automatisk n친r registreringsvinduene 친pner - **Forbedret notifikasjons system**: K칮basert notifikasjoner med prioritetsh친ndtering - **Automatisk oppdateringssjekk**: Sjekker etter nye versjoner hver 30. minutt - **Detaljert logging**: Omfattende loggf칮ring med mulighet for detaljerte debug-meldinger - **Innstillinger**: Konfigurerbar logging og programinnstillinger ### Installasjon og Oppsett #### macOS 1. Last ned `AkademiTrack.app` fra [[releases siden](https://github.com/CyberGutta/AkademiTrack/releases)](https://github.com/CyberGutta/AkademiTrack/releases) 2. Etter nedlasting, kj칮r denne kommandoen i Terminal for 친 fjerne karantene-attributter: ```bash xattr -cr ~/Downloads/AkademiTrack.app ``` (Erstatt `~/Downloads/` med faktisk plassering av programmet) 3. Dobbeltklikk for 친 kj칮re programmet #### Linux 1. Last ned Linux-versjonen fra [[releases siden](https://github.com/CyberGutta/AkademiTrack/releases)](https://github.com/CyberGutta/AkademiTrack/releases) 2. Pakk ut den nedlastede filen 3. Naviger til mappen i terminal og kj칮r: ```bash chmod +x ./AkademiTrack # Test kj칮ring ./AkademiTrack ``` #### Windows 1. Last ned `AkademiTrack.exe` fra [[releases siden](https://github.com/CyberGutta/AkademiTrack/releases)](https://github.com/CyberGutta/AkademiTrack/releases) 2. Kj칮r filen direkte ### F칮rste Gangs Oppsett Ved f칮rste oppstart vil programmet be om f칮lgende informasjon: 1. **Velg din skole** fra dropdown-listen (alle Akademiet skoler) 2. **Skriv inn Feide brukernavn** (din e-postadresse) 3. **Skriv inn Feide passord** 4. Klikk **"Lagre og fortsett"** Disse opplysningene lagres **kryptert** p친 din maskin og brukes til automatisk innlogging. Du kan endre disse n친r som helst i innstillinger. ### Hvordan Det Fungerer 1. **Start automatisering**: Klikk p친 "Start Automatisering" knappen (eller la auto-start gj칮re det) 2. **Automatisk innlogging**: Programmet logger inn automatisk med lagrede opplysninger 3. **Overv친king starter**: Programmet henter dagens STU-칮kter og sjekker for konflikter med andre timer 4. **Automatisk registrering**: N친r et registreringsvindu 친pner, registreres oppm칮te automatisk 5. **Fullf칮ring**: Programmet stopper n친r alle 칮kter for dagen er behandlet ### Innstillinger Tilgjengelige innstillinger i innstillingsvinduet: #### Generelt - **Vis aktivitetslogg**: Viser/skjuler loggpanel i hovedvinduet - **Detaljert logging**: Aktiverer DEBUG-meldinger for feils칮king - **Start med system**: Starter programmet automatisk ved systemoppstart #### Automatisering - **Auto-start automatisering**: Starter automatisering automatisk n친r programmet 친pnes - **Lagrede innloggingsopplysninger**: Administrer Feide e-post, passord og skolenavn #### Oppdateringer - **Sjekk etter oppdateringer**: Manuell oppdateringssjekk - **Last ned og installer**: Enkel oppdatering til siste versjon ### Kjente Problemer - **Linux Auto-start Bug**: Auto-start funksjonalitet fungerer ikke p친 Linux. Dette vil bli fikset i en senere oppdatering. --- ## 游쥟릖 English ### About the Program AkademiTrack is an automation tool that helps students at Akademiet (a Norwegian school) automatically register attendance for STU (Independent Term Projects) sessions. The program monitors schedule data and registers attendance when registration windows open. ### Key Features - **Saved login credentials**: Encrypted storage of Feide username, password and school name for automatic login - **Auto-start automation**: Optional automatic startup of automation when program launches - **Intelligent monitoring**: Only monitors relevant STU sessions for the current day - **Class conflict detection**: Automatically skips STU sessions that overlap with other classes - **Optimized performance**: Makes only one API request per day to fetch schedule data - **Real-time registration**: Automatically registers attendance when registration windows open - **Enhanced notification system**: Queue-based notifications with priority handling - **Automatic update checking**: Checks for new versions every 30 minutes - **Detailed logging**: Comprehensive logging with option for detailed debug messages - **Settings**: Configurable logging and program settings ### Installation and Setup #### macOS 1. Download `AkademiTrack.app` from the [[releases page](https://github.com/CyberGutta/AkademiTrack/releases)](https://github.com/CyberGutta/AkademiTrack/releases) 2. After downloading, run this command in Terminal to remove quarantine attributes: ```bash xattr -cr ~/Downloads/AkademiTrack.app ``` (Replace `~/Downloads/` with the actual location of the program) 3. Double-click to run the application #### Linux 1. Download the Linux version from the [[releases page](https://github.com/CyberGutta/AkademiTrack/releases)](https://github.com/CyberGutta/AkademiTrack/releases) 2. Extract the downloaded file 3. Navigate to the folder in terminal and run: ```bash chmod +x ./AkademiTrack # Test run ./AkademiTrack ``` #### Windows 1. Download `AkademiTrack.exe` from the [[releases page](https://github.com/CyberGutta/AkademiTrack/releases)](https://github.com/CyberGutta/AkademiTrack/releases) 2. Run the file directly ### First Time Setup On first launch, the program will ask for the following information: 1. **Select your school** from the dropdown (all Akademiet schools) 2. **Enter Feide username** (your email address) 3. **Enter Feide password** 4. Click **"Lagre og fortsett" (Save and continue)** This information is stored **encrypted** on your machine and used for automatic login. You can change these anytime in settings. ### How It Works 1. **Start automation**: Click the "Start Automatisering" (Start Automation) button (or let auto-start do it) 2. **Automatic login**: Program logs in automatically with saved credentials 3. **Monitoring begins**: Program fetches today's STU sessions and checks for conflicts with other classes 4. **Automatic registration**: When a registration window opens, attendance is automatically registered 5. **Completion**: Program stops when all sessions for the day have been handled ### Settings Available settings in the settings window: #### General - **Show activity log**: Shows/hides log panel in main window - **Detailed logging**: Enables DEBUG messages for troubleshooting - **Start with system**: Starts program automatically at system startup #### Automation - **Auto-start automation**: Starts automation automatically when program opens - **Saved login credentials**: Manage Feide email, password and school name #### Updates - **Check for updates**: Manual update check - **Download and install**: Easy update to latest version ### Known Issues - **Linux Auto-start Bug**: Auto-start functionality doesn't work on Linux. This will be fixed in a future update. --- ## Systemkrav / System Requirements - **Operativsystem / Operating System**: Windows, macOS, Linux - **Internett / Internet**: Stabil internettforbindelse / Stable internet connection - **Tilgang / Access**: Gyldig iSkole konto ved Akademiet / Valid iSkole account at Akademiet ## Sikkerhet og Personvern / Security and Privacy - **Kryptert lagring / Encrypted storage**: Alle innloggingsopplysninger krypteres f칮r lagring / All login credentials are encrypted before storage - **Lokalt lagret data / Locally stored data**: Alle data lagres kun lokalt p친 din maskin / All data is stored only locally on your machine - **Ingen datainnsamling / No data collection**: Programmet sender ikke personopplysninger til utvikleren / Program does not send personal information to the developer - **Sikker autentisering / Secure authentication**: Bruker offisiell iSkole innloggingsmetode / Uses official iSkole login method - **Automatisk opprydding / Automatic cleanup**: Gamle logger og data slettes automatisk / Old logs and data are automatically deleted ## Feils칮king / Troubleshooting **Problem**: Automatisering stopper uventet / Automation stops unexpectedly - **L칮sning / Solution**: Start p친 nytt for 친 f친 nye autentisering-cookies / Restart to get new authentication cookies **Problem**: Ingen STU-칮kter funnet / No STU sessions found - **L칮sning / Solution**: Kontroller at du har STU-칮kter i timeplanen din for i dag / Check that you have STU sessions in your schedule for today **Problem**: Programmet registrerer ikke STU-칮kt / Program doesn't register STU session - **L칮sning / Solution**: Sjekk om 칮kten overlapper med en annen time - programmet hopper over konflikter / Check if session overlaps with another class - program skips conflicts ## Support For teknisk support eller sp칮rsm친l / For technical support or questions: - Opprett en [[issue](https://github.com/CyberGutta/AkademiTrack/issues)](https://github.com/CyberGutta/AkademiTrack/issues) i GitHub repository - Kontakt utviklerne direkte / Contact the developers directly ## Contributors - **Andreas Nilsen** ([[@CyberNilsen](https://github.com/CyberNilsen)](https://github.com/CyberNilsen)) - **Mathias Hansen** ([[@CyberHansen](https://github.com/CyberHansen)](https://github.com/CyberHansen)) ## Versjon / Version **Gjeldende versjon / Current version**: 1.0.0 ### Changelog #### v1.0.0 - Initial release - Encrypted credential storage for automatic login - Auto-start automation option - Class conflict detection - Notification queuing system implemented - Automatic update checking every 30 minutes - Tutorial improvements - Known issue: Linux auto-start functionality not working ## Lisens / License This project is licensed under the MIT License - see the [[LICENSE](https://claude.ai/chat/LICENSE)](LICENSE) file for details. ## Ansvarsfraskrivelse / Disclaimer Dette verkt칮yet er designet for 친 hjelpe studenter med legitim oppm칮teregistrering. Brukere er ansvarlige for 친 sikre at bruken deres overholder skolens retningslinjer og akademiske integritetsstandarder. This tool is designed to assist students with legitimate attendance registration. Users are responsible for ensuring their use complies with school policies and academic integrity standards. --- **Website**: [[cybergutta.github.io/AkademietTrack](https://cybergutta.github.io/AkademietTrack/)](https://cybergutta.github.io/AkademietTrack/) **Topics**: education, automation, csharp, cross-platform, dotnet, norwegian, selenium, http-client, gui-application, desktop-application, avalonia, web-scraping, notification-system, attendance-tracking, cookie-management, student-tools, avalonia-ui, school-automation, akademiet
